zExercise1

Input 
5 100 1000 10000 100000 1000000 10000000 0

Output 
5 3  8  1
100 97  119  0
1000 871  179  1
10000 6171  262  4
100000 77031  351  25
1000000 837799  525  231
10000000 8400511  686  2562

Input 
5 10000 100000 0 1000

Output
5 3  8  1
10000 6171  262  5
100000 77031  351  25


For the graph:
Input 
5 100 1000 10000 100000 1000000 10000000 20000000 30000000 40000000 50000000 60000000 70000000 80000000 0

Output
5 3  8  0
100 97  119  0
1000 871  179  1
10000 6171  262  4
100000 77031  351  28
1000000 837799  525  233
10000000 8400511  686  2580
20000000 15733191  705  5394
30000000 15733191  705  8235
40000000 36791535  745  11085
50000000 36791535  745  14009
60000000 36791535  745  16865
70000000 63728127  950  19832
80000000 63728127  950  22868

Exercise 2

Input
5 100 1000 10000 100000 1000000 10000000 0

Output
5 3  15  0
100 70  328  0
1000 801  1013  2
10000 9087  1146  7
100000 98003  1553  58


For the graph:
Input 
5 100 1000 10000 100000 120000 130000 140000 150000 160000 180000 190000 0

5 3  15  0
100 70  328  0
1000 801  1013  2
10000 9087  1146  7
100000 98003  1553  58
120000 103331  1614  60
130000 103331  1614  65
140000 133155  1641  73
150000 144613  1683  76
160000 157571  2022  81
180000 157571  2022  93
190000 180081  2026  99
